name: Washed Out Hotel
description:
Play as a hostel janitor whose job consists of a simple thing: fight all those filthy ghosts at night, then during the daytime, clean up those ghosts' remains!

The game was made for the Ben Bonk Jam #3.

There isn't a web version of the game, as we use Wwise for the sound and it doesn't support WebGL, sorry :x 

If the game appears small, know that you can change the resolution of the game on the main menu, on the upper right! 

If you get a Windows warning, you can decline it, it wont change anything apparently, so feel free to do it! 

We hope that you will enjoy the game :D Sound Designer: Pierrick Veillerobe https://twitter.com/VeillerobePrrck

Graphic Designer: Tanguy Barrull https://www.instagram.com/tanguy___tanguy/

Programmer: Paul Mozet https://twitter.com/MrPouletBZH
